title: DUCK FAT GRAVY
directions: Cook the Onion and garlic in the rendered duck fat, until frangrant and slightly browned.
Whisk in the flour to create a roux, and cook on low heat until slightly browned, 10-15 minutes.
Slowly add in chicken stock, whisking constantly, until fully incorporated. Bring mixture to a boil, and simmer for 15 minutes. add in heavy cream, and season to taste. Also add confit duck to taste
ingredients: 2 cups warm chicken or duck stock
